website_summaries.verdict: A tried-and-true barrel design that is commonly used by professional ball players.
pros: A wrap-style weight adds significantly more heft than donuts or hitting jackets, making the bat feel much lighter when you’re at the plate
Made from recycled polycarbonate plastic that is nearly unbreakable
Total weight is 24 ounces, and it fits 2.62-inch and 2.75-inch diameter alloy and composite bats as well as adult wood bats
cons: The grip may scratch wood composite bats

customer_reviews.title: Best bat weight made
customer_reviews.text: Best bat weight on the market.I always saw this same one on the Major League Baseball games on TV .I decided to get it and am happily satisfied.It will be the last bat weight you buy period.Very sturdy and my son loves it.The whole team loves it and uses it.
customer_reviews.author: dmac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to use during his al star games, and the whole team fell in love. These are 11 year olds and it was not to heavy. Great product
customer_reviews.author: kiyacorley

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for all Ball Players
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as his team needed one to make their bats lighter while standing in the on-deck circle. It fits 2-5/8 and 2-3/4 big barrel bats. He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Corporate14

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 yr old who is playing in the senior LL and his teammates also use it now. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Sr

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect amount of weight to practice or warm up with
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect amount of weight to practice or warm up with. The plastic is very thick and feels very sturdy so hopefully it will last for a while. I've used it on both aluminum and wooden bats and it feels great. It doesn't feel off balanced. It's a little hard to comes off at times but it's expected that I'd have to slam the bat down a little harder.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Works at it should
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is it sometimes gets stuck on the bat. No big issue
customer_reviews.author: Book Guy!

customer_reviews.title: A little big for slowpitch softball bats.
customer_reviews.text: Just a hair too big for my softball bat, but I taped a cloth shim on the inside and now it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Weight
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Since I coach my sons team, most of the boys used it when on deck. Fit BBCOR bats just fine. Every now and then it would get stuck on a bat and I would have to slam the bat a little harder then the boys to get it off the bat. If you need a weight this will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Coup

customer_reviews.title: Great bat weight for the team
customer_reviews.text: Great bat weight for the team, you can bang this around all you want and it'll hold up I'm sure for the long season!!
customer_reviews.author: rip

customer_reviews.title: Good weight for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good bar weight. It does leave about 1/8” deep linear marks on wooden bats though due to rubbing on the inside of the weight. Shouldn’t impact bat performance.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Combs

customer_reviews.title: Great but hard to get off the bat
customer_reviews.text: Great professional looking bat weight.. hard to get off though..
customer_reviews.author: Julia J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son got this and was the only one using it at first, now the whole team grabs it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what’s it meant to do. Use it for my wooden bat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No where near 24 oz.
customer_reviews.text: My Boy has a 16 oz. round weight and this is identical to it in weight.
customer_reviews.author: ADT

customer_reviews.title: The right Bat weight!
customer_reviews.text: Donuts need not apply. This is exactly what I needed for the on-deck circle. I play in an Adult wood baseball bat league and swing a 34" S318 model bat. This bat weight actually fits properly on the larger bats - even with a medium barrel. There were others on the team that had other bat weights like this one that slide almost off the bat end. The Donuts are just too light and don't offer much of any resistance.
customer_reviews.author: AviSB

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have it
customer_reviews.text: My son is a big boy. We have used the power wrap since he as 9. Can't hit without it. We left our last one at a park and didn't get it back had to have another
customer_reviews.author: kevin chenoweth

customer_reviews.title: My kid likes it and it seems well made
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes it and it seems well made. It is designed for and we recommend it for adult bats.
customer_reviews.author: Henry O. Milliken

customer_reviews.title: Great weight to make your bat feel lighter, but scratches up the bat's barrel
customer_reviews.text: The good: This has really made me a better, more confident hitter at the plate. Because it's significantly heavier than a typical donut, it makes your bat feel incredibly light when you take it off and get into the batter's box. The bad: I use wood composite bats, and this has left dozens of scratches on the barrels. If anyone has any tips on how to prevent this, I'd love to hear them.
customer_reviews.author: Joedy McCreary

product_meta.title: Pow'r Wrap Bat Weight for Baseball, 24-Ounce, White
product_meta.description:
Pow'r Wrap for baseball fits 2 5/8" & 2 3/4" diameter bats and fits adult sized wooden bats. Legal in all baseball leagues. Use the Pow'r Wrap to loosen up on-deck prior to your at bat or use in the off-season to keep hitting muscles tuned up. Used by hundreds of pros and seen on TV. Increase your bat speed and hit the ball with more power!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Developed for players by players, The Pow'r Wrap Bat Weight is a safe and effective way to warm-up before your "at-bat" at the plate. Used by all the major league teams and legal for virtually all baseball leagues including youth leagues, high school leagues, and collegiate leagues. The Pow'r Wrap is the choice for equipment managers and players. Made of a tough, durable high-tech plastic composite, Pow'r Wrap places most of its weight on the barrel of the bat, providing an effective warm-up and a way to train year 'round.
feature_bullets: Places most of the weight on the barrel of the bat--giving a heavier effective weight than donuts or hitting jackets.
Fits 2 5/8" and 2 3/4" diameter alloy/composite bats and also adult wood bats.
Durable--made of recycled polycarbonate plastic. Virtually indestructible.
Used by the pros, seen on TV every game day.
Excellent on-deck and off season training weight
The choice of professional ball players for over 26 years
